{"id":1002516626,"question_id":2882,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690192942,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"320 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1002516626/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Ways to Express an Integer as Sum of Powers","memory":"44.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int numberOfWays(int n, int x) {\n        \n        int[][] dp = new int[305][305];\n        \n        int M = (int) 1e9+7;\n        dp[0][0] = 1;\n        \n        for (int i=0; i<=n; i++)        \n            for (int j=1; j<=n; j++)\n            {\n                dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1];\n\n                long num = 1;\n                for (int t=0; t<x; t++)\n                    num *= j;\n\n                if (num <= i)\n                {\n                    dp[i][j] += dp[(int)(i-num)][j-1];\n                    dp[i][j] %= M;\n                }                \n            }            \n                        \n        return dp[n][n];\n        \n    }\n    \n    \n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"ways-to-express-an-integer-as-sum-of-powers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
